name: Trump Game Early Prototype
description:
Super early version of this project can test out if you want to 

Game Super Bad Be Aware

Controls:

R & T change type of shooting

Pressing E will allow you to fly Shift will make you go up and ctrl down.

Q Allows you to activate the portal gun   Note: Portal Gun Still In development to doesn't work as intended and 1 will allow you to go back to the gun

Press F will allow you to build walls and pressing C will de activate

Shooting Left Mouse Button

Walking WSAD
